pages.text: $(l)放牧機$()用於自動牧場，且可使用升級組件強化。$(br)但需要指定的物品才能運作:(設置時將其放於2X2的空間中)

$(l)Sword:$() if present in the inventory, will kill animals if there are more than 7 in its range.$(br2)$(l)Wheat/Seed/Carrot:$() if present in the inventory, will be fed to the respective animals in it's range.$(br2)$(l)Bucket:$() if present in the inventory, will collect milk from cows.
